title: Lamar Jackson, Kenny Smith, LeBron James, Jim Harbaugh
itunes:title: Lamar Jackson, Kenny Smith, LeBron James, Jim Harbaugh
description:
Colin talks about Lamar Jackson being great but Patrick Mahomes being way ahead, Kenny Smith saying LeBron James isn't in his top 5, and Jim Harbaugh's comments on playing college football during this pandemic. Guests include Mark Schlereth, Antonio Gates, Rob Parker, and Michael Pittman Jr.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
